reuters.title: belgrade - tanjug says yugoslavia reaches paris pact on refinancing part of debt
reuters.body: Oper shr 12 cts vs nine cts Oper net 4,027,852 vs 3,200,837 Revs 100.2 mln vs 46.0 mln Note: Oper net excludes tax credits of 517,916 vs 198,000 Current year results include proceeds from termination of a pension plan. Reuter 
